title: French beef stew
ingredients: ['675g cubed beef stewing steak', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '400ml beef stock', '4 carrots, chopped', '2 potatoes, peeled and chopped', '3/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard']
